```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```


```{r}
fx <- expression(x^2)
df_dx <- D(expr = fx, name = "x")
df_dx
x = 3 
eval(df_dx)
```

```{r}
pa <- expression(2*(3*a +2)^4 - 5)
df_da <- D(expr = pa, name = "a")
df_da
a = 1.2 
eval(df_da)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = bill_length_mm,
                            y = bill_depth_mm)) + 
  geom_point(aes(color = species)) + 
  scale_color_manual(values = c("darkgreen", "darkblue", "darkred")) + 
  labs(x = "Penguin bill length (mm)",
       y = "Penguin bill depth (mm)", 
       title = "Penguin bill length vs depth")
```


```{r}
ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = species, 
                            y = flipper_length_mm))+ 
  geom_jitter() + 
  labs(x = "Penguin species", 
       y = "Flipper length (mm)", 
       title = "Flipper length per species")
```
